item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description:
Thanks for the screenshot.
It's always nice when the criminals self identify. The issue is whether Blizzard is as good at taking out the selfidentified cheaters as they are the bugs in the game...
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the screenshot.

It’s always nice when the criminals self identify. The issue is whether Blizzard is as good at taking out the selfidentified cheaters as they are the bugs in the game…

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I'm inclined to agree. Sometimes works when I'm not logged in to Furl, sometimes not. Made a <a href="http://static.flickr.com/42/122896309_3d17bd8d64_o.png" rel="nofollow">screenshot</a> and uploaded to flickr account.
item.content:encoded: I’m inclined to agree. Sometimes works when I’m not logged in to Furl, sometimes not. Made a screenshot and uploaded to flickr account.

item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description: Furl sucks. Or maybe it's me, but either ways, I can never read the Furl archives. I have an account, signed in, and I can find your archive. Can't read any of the threads though.
item.content:encoded: Furl sucks. Or maybe it’s me, but either ways, I can never read the Furl archives. I have an account, signed in, and I can find your archive. Can’t read any of the threads though.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Updated link with Furl archive of thread. Also, I see on Scott's post history, that he's not happy with the faux announcement of the new Alliance race, wisps:
<blockquote>sorry blizzard, i think everyones been waiting for awhile for thenew alliance race and ive heard some GMS say "its will all make sense when the race is released" um... NO, this is fkin retarded yay your always dead, makes no sense, how will your item avatar show? and the last thing i wanna comment on is a night night elf is a whisp correct, making the new race night elf... thats not a new race, you've lost your touch blizzard has gone way down hill obveiously you guys have no idea what to do with the warcraft story line and i think you guys need to pick up your act</blockquote>
item.content:encoded:
Updated link with Furl archive of thread. Also, I see on Scott’s post history, that he’s not happy with the faux announcement of the new Alliance race, wisps:

sorry blizzard, i think everyones been waiting for awhile for thenew alliance race and ive heard some GMS say “its will all make sense when the race is released” um… NO, this is fkin retarded yay your always dead, makes no sense, how will your item avatar show? and the last thing i wanna comment on is a night night elf is a whisp correct, making the new race night elf… thats not a new race, you’ve lost your touch blizzard has gone way down hill obveiously you guys have no idea what to do with the warcraft story line and i think you guys need to pick up your act
